messages.title: Luke's pledges to you...
messages.content: Luke Pollard's commitments to Plymouth including Brexit, armed forces, school funding, NHS, opposing the 'Dementia Tax', and putting Plymouth first.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A good Brexit deal for Plymouth
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Luke will fight for a Brexit deal that secures jobs and rights to protect our environment, fishermen and back.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Stand up for our armed forces
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Luke will always support Royal Navy and Royal Marines, Trident, fight defence cuts and support veterans.
Luke wants properly funded schools and calls for resources to help Plymouth's children succeed.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect our hospitals and the NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Luke opposes Tory cuts and NHS privatisation, and will invest in NHS to train more doctors and nurses.
Luke will stand up for Plymouth's pensioners against the 'Dementia Tax' and plans to scrap Winter Fuel Allowance.
Luke pledges to always put Plymouth before party and ensure Plymouth is always put first.

issues.brexitEurope: A good Brexit deal for Plymouth.
issues.environment: A good Brexit deal that protects our environment.
issues.health: Protect our hospitals and the NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Born in Plymouth, lives in Plymouth, putting Plymouth first.

images.caption: Image of Luke Pollard with text: Vote Labour on 8 June - Luke Pollard Born in Plymouth, Lives in Plymouth, Putting Plymouth first.
